byline.contributor: David W. Chen, Christine Hauser, Noah Remnick and Rick Rojas contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: David Wichs, 38, graduated with a degree in mathematics from Harvard and had a career in finance. A neighbor said Friday that Mr. Wichs was “so unusually lovely.”

headline.print_headline: Crash Victim, an Immigrant, Is Remembered as ‘Quiet and Warm and Decent’
headline.main: Immigrant Killed in Manhattan Crane Collapse Recalled as Decent and Humble

snippet: David Wichs, 38, graduated with a degree in mathematics from Harvard and had a career in finance. A neighbor said Friday that Mr. Wichs was “so unusually lovely.”
abstract: David Wichs, man killed during crane crash in New York City, is remembered as kind, honest man whose life embodied immigrant dream; trading firm employee emigrated to United States from Czechoslovakia as a teenager, and went on to study mathematics at Harvard University.
